summary:
A new craftable heavy armor, mace and shield found under Elven category plus a unique armored horse.

Available for UNP, CBBE, CBBE-TBBP, BodySlide.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman][img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1419352665.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412459723.png[/img]

The High Heels versions require [b]HDT High Heels System[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][/b]!

TBBP versions require TBBP/HDT supported body, skeleton and animations or xml.

For the recipes to appear in the crafting interface you need to have the crafting manual in your inventory!

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412459723.png[/img]

A new craftable heavy armor, mace and shield found under Elven category plus a unique armored horse.
Available for UNP, CBBE, CBBE-TBBP, BodySlide

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419352665.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412462830.png[/img]
[youtube]CrwtXfdF2r0[/youtube] [youtube]iJLv-jmQVnA[/youtube]
[youtube]pdGO3OJSoLg[/youtube] [youtube]5yzItFktlbU[/youtube]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412459723.png[/img]

This is the eleventh armor of a series that will hopefully reach twenty four armors. The idea originated from Minidresses Collection mod by Tiwa44 who did an awesome job converting some of the long dresses to mini versions.

[b]A big THANK YOU to all that donated, endorsed, commented or just played and keep playing using this and the previous mods!
[/b]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1442736357.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460420.png[/img]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1419411697.png[/img]
[i][font=Times New Roman][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1419482870.png[/img][/font][/i]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413848639.png[/img]

- Low Resolution Textures

- Light Armor Version

- Optional Bra under the chain mail

- CBBE Bodyslide Files

- German Translation

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412746639.png[/img]

- 7B Bombshell: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61098/?]Emfy Cleric Robes SevenBase BombShell 7B HDT PE by RickerHK[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection - UNPB by gutris1[/url]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-4-1419352665.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412746640.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url] for the HDT version.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412746640.png[/img]

Using High Heels Versions without HDT High Heels System will cause your game to crash.
Due to the many transparencies of the armors, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
If you are using HDT HighHeels System and you see weird numbers at the top left of your screen disable the debug info as shown below.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405232089.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using any mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-3-1419352665.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412507195.png[/img]

a) Using any mod manager
b) Manual by deleting [b]Emfy Cleric Robes.esp[/b] from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folders [b]Emfy Cleric[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ folders.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419352687.png[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412460007.png[/img]

Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192/?]Eyes of Aber by Aberin[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54118/?]The Neith Team Warpaints Set by ElaNeith[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture by Xs2reality[/url]
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221/?]KS Hairdos - 265 by Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/url]
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24828/?]Bleak ENB by akiro[/url]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460007.png[/img]

If you want to use any of the non vanilla meshes of this mod please credit/contact the original creators listed bellow. Anything else you can use freely at Skyrim Nexus as long as you credit our work in the comments.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412460007.png[/img]

Tunic [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]
Mace [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?]Warrior Within Weapons by BloodFree[/url]
Halo [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11005/?]Angelic Halos and Demonic Horns by volvaga0[/url]
Cloak [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB[/url]
Horse Armor [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13348/?]Horse Armors for Skyrim by Mystikhybrid - Gabriel Gullbergh[/url]
Horse Textures [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39128/?]Hale - Horse Retexture by Halendia[/url]
Headband [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?]KDCirclets Redone by zzjay and harokyang[/url]
Shoes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56758/?]Charming High Heels for CBBE HDT by arison_c[/url]
Skirt [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide by ChronoTrigger77[/url]
Stockings, Armlets [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
Underwear [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14294/?]Osare Underwear - UNP by anano[/url]

Many thanks to:

The team behind [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 & Outfit Studio[/url] - Without which the CBBE versions would not have been possible.
Special thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?tb=mods&pUp=1]ousnius[/url] for all the time he has spent offering help and tips on using Outfit Studio.

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda that made all this possible.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-3-1419352687.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866875.png[/img]
